name: Little Big Rabbits
description:
Little Big Rabbits is a 3D Platformer. The first game from NineRogues Indie Game Studio.

A mean red monster has taken hostage the princess.

Tedder, your childhood friend and now rival, wants to save the ladies more than you do. This is impossible! You're the lady killer around here.

Go rescue the princess before its too late. You have 6 worlds to explore with different environments, many mechanics to master and tons of dinos to smash!

The game can be played both in First and Third Person (Adjust using ScrollWheel or Controller DPad Left + Right).
